TextView.android:text: Standard \nPhraseology
I have received all of your last transmissio
Say Again
Repeat all, or the following part of your transmission
Slow down
Reduce your speed
Speak Slowe
Reduce your rate of speech
Set the mode/code as instructed
Wait and I will call you
Unable
I cannot comply with your request, instruction, or clearance. (Normally followed by a reason)
Check and confirm with originator
I understand your message and will comply with it
My transmission is ended and I expect a response from you. (Not normally used in VHF Communication)
Hear and understand
Repeat all, or the specified part of this message back to me exactly as received.
A change has been made to your last clearance and this new clearance supersedes your previous clearance or part thereof.
Pass me the following information.
Revision
Reconsidered or corrected version/calculation of time
Immediate(ly)
At once without delay due immanent risk/hazard
I say again
I repeat for clarity or emphasis
Depart, abandon, go away from
Look out (for)
View over, survey inspection, (watch out for immanent risk/hazard
Maintain
Continue in accordance with the condition(s) specified or in its literal sense, e.g. maintain VFR
Listen out on frequency
No/Permission not granted/that is not correct/not capable
This exchange of transmission is ended and no response is expected. (not normally used in VHF Communications.)
Descend to maintain (to level out)
Disregard
Calculate/ make approximate calculation.
Speed up, increase speed/rate.
How do you read
What is the readability of my transmission
Authorized to proceed under the conditions specified
Climb to maintain (to level out) Comply
I request verification of; (Clearance, instruction, action, information).
Establish communication with..
True or accurate
An error has been made in this transmission. The correct version is..
Fly/taxi across, pass from one side to the other side of..
Take-off, departing
Let me know that you received and understood this message.
The time the flight started after the take-off phase
Permission for proposed action granted.
I hereby indicate the separation between portions of the message. (to be used where there is no clear distinction between the text and other portions of the message).
Break break
I hereby indicate the separation between messages transmitted to different addressees in a very busy environment.
Annul the previously transmitted clearance
Beware of the following conditions or situations.
Examine a system or Procedure. (No answer is normally expected).
Q Codes
This code is used to indicate the atmospheric pressure at sea level, which is used as a reference for setting altimeters.
QFE
This code is used to indicate the atmosphericpressure at the location of the airport, whichis used to set altimeters for landing
This code is used to indicate the magnetic bearing to an airport from the aircraft's current position.
This code is used to indicate the magnetic bearing from the aircraft's current position to a specified location
QNH/QFE
This code is used to clarify whether the altimeter setting provided is based on the atmospheric pressure at sea level (QNH) or the pressure at the airport (QFE).
This code is used to request a change in frequency for communication.
QHN CHECK
This code is used to confirm the correct atmospheric pressure setting for the altimeter.
QNH DECREASE/INCREASE
These codes are used to request a decrease or increase in the altimeter setting, respectively.
QRH
This code is used to refer to the Quick Reference Handbook, which contains procedures and checklists for abnormal or emergency situations.
